<section class="nutrition-info">
    <h2>Benefits</h2>
    <p class="desc">Improved health for you and for baby!* Probiotics area a top recommended supplement for expectant moms! MegaFlora for Baby &amp; Me contains a broad spectrum of our proprietary blend of 14 unique strains of 30 billion probiotics.</p>

    <h2>Supplement Facts</h2>

    <div class="serving-info">
        <ul>
            <li>Form <span class="tablet">Tablet</span></li>
            <li>Serving size <span>2</span></li>
        </ul>

        <p class="serving-directions">2 tablets daily. May be taken anytime throughout the day, even on an empty stomach.</p>
    </div>

    <div class="img">
        <img src="https://via.placeholder.com/750x750" alt="product name supplement facts">
    </div>

    <h3>More Information</h3>
    <small>Store at a controlled temperature, not to exceed 75ÂºF. Temperature Sensitive. Do not leave in sun or heated areas.</small>
</section>
 
<section class="nutrition-info">
	<h2>Benefits</h2>
	<p class="desc">Improved health for you and for baby!* Probiotics area a top recommended supplement for expectant moms! MegaFlora for Baby &amp; Me contains a broad spectrum of our proprietary blend of 14 unique strains of 30 billion probiotics.</p>

	<h2>Supplement Facts</h2>
	
	<div class="serving-info">
		<ul>
			<li>Form <span class="tablet">Tablet</span></li>
			<li>Serving size <span>2</span></li>
		</ul>
	
		<p class="serving-directions">2 tablets daily. May be taken anytime throughout the day, even on an empty stomach.</p>
	</div>
	
	<div class="img">
		<img src="https://via.placeholder.com/750x750" alt="product name supplement facts">
	</div>

	<h3>More Information</h3>
	<small>Store at a controlled temperature, not to exceed 75ÂºF. Temperature Sensitive. Do not leave in sun or heated areas.</small>
</section>

  • Content: 
    .nutrition-info {
    position: relative;
    background-color: $finn;
    color: $white;
    padding: px-to-rem(191px) $gutter-sm $bottom-margin $gutter-sm;

    &::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: px-to-rem(32px);
        left: 50%;
        height: px-to-rem(130px);
        width: px-to-rem(129px);
        background-image: url('../../assets/img/nutrition-with-ambition.svg');
        background-position: center;
        background-size: contain;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
    }
    
    h2, h3 {
        color: $white;
    }

    h3 {
        @include secondary-font(600);
    }

    .desc {
        font-size: px-to-rem(21px);
        max-width: px-to-rem(720px);//keeps text at good length for readability (80 chars per line)
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(48px);
    }

    .serving-info {
        ul {
            @include remove-list();
        }

        span {
            font-weight: 600;
        }
    }

    .img {
        background-color: $white;
        padding: px-to-rem(32px) 1rem;
        margin-bottom: $bottom-margin;

        img {
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
    }

    p {
        max-width: px-to-rem(550px);//keeps text at good length for readability (80 chars per line)
    }

    small {
        display: block;
        max-width: px-to-rem(550px);
        color: $white;
        margin-bottom: $bottom-margin;
    }

    a {
        color: $white;

        &:hover, &:focus {
            color: $vidaLoca;
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-m) {
        .serving-info {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: flex-end;

            ul {
                margin-right: px-to-rem(32px);
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {
        padding: px-to-rem(60px) px-to-rem(40px);

        &::before {
            top: px-to-rem(47px);
            left: auto;
            right: px-to-rem(40px);
            transform: none;
        }

        .desc {
            max-width: 41rem;//prevents it from overlapping w/::before icon
        }

        .img {
            padding: 5rem;
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lg) {
        padding: px-to-rem(60px) px-to-rem(64px);

        &::before {
            right: px-to-rem(64px);
            height: px-to-rem(150px);
            width: px-to-rem(149.4px);
        }

        .desc {
            font-size: px-to-rem(24px);
            max-width: px-to-rem(800px);
        }

        .img {
            margin-bottom: px-to-rem(40px);
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lxl) {
        .desc {
            max-width: px-to-rem(821px);
        }
    }
}
